lines.text: Looks to me like you boys have mapped out a pretty busy summer for ourselves.
Mr. Logan?
What?
I sure do like you.
Darlene, do you have a boyfriend?
Oh sure, a couple, but I'm not going steady.
Do you wanna go steady with me?
Who'd've thought? Ambitious, the guy who way always allergic to girls!
Yeah.
You oughtta know.
Who?
You know who.
They said you were kinda peeved at me.
So I was peeved.
I didn't mean to cut in on you -
But you did!
You've got no more claim on Dynamite than the rest of us. You didn't bring him in any more than we did.
I told you I didn't want to talk about it.
If he hadn't chased Perkins in -
I said I don't want to talk about it.
All right, if that's the way you feel about it.
That's the way I feel about it.
Dynamite doesn't belong to me more than any of the rest of the kids.
Yes sir, Dynamite, you're turning out to be a real fine saddle horse, real fine.
I suppose you're mad at me?
Forget it.
Marty, if we had a dozen fights, we'd still be friends.
